landingSection.name: Christian Rodríguez
landingSection.description: Software Engineer - Full Stack Developer - Machine Learning

aboutSection.subtitle: Get to know me
aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.description: I'm a software engineer from Costa Rica who's passionate about creating innovative solutions. I'm currently leveraging my skills at EY to develop blockchain-powered applications that tackle complex business challenges. I'm also pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at the Universidad de Costa Rica with a focus on Machine Learning. I'm always eager to learn, create, and connect with people. In my free time, I enjoy playing sports, watching movies, and exploring new technologies.

projectsSection.subtitle: Somethings I'm proud of
projectsSection.title: Projects
projectsSection.description: I'm working on improving the documentation of my journey as a software engineer. Stay tuned for working demos (or at least a video recording :) )

projects.title: EY Blockchain
projects.description: EY Blockchain is a platform that allows users to create and manage their own blockchain networks. It also provides a set of tools to interact with the blockchain network and deploy smart contracts.

contactSection.title: Get in touch
contactSection.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
